descriptionHtml:
[color=#cc0000]2k Dragonscale Armor[/color]
[color=#616161][size=2]
[/size][/color][color=#ffffff]Description:[size=2]
[/size]Since there is no 2k vanilla mod here, i decided to retexture the Dragonscale Armor
[size=2]with small color tweaks on the horns and scales so the armor may not be monochromatic.
By the way, i leave the mod replaceable, that is it's purpose.
[/size][size=2]
[/size]Installation:[size=2]
[/size]You can use NMM for quick installation or you can extract the file manually and copy the folder "Textures" to DataProgram FilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrim[size=2]
[/size][size=2]
[/size]Permissions:[size=2]
[/size]1) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my files to other sites![size=2]
[/size]2) Users/Modders are not allowed to convert my file so that it works on similar games![size=2]
[/size]3) Users/Modders are not allowed to modify my file including releasing bug fixes or improving on the features my file adds to the game and upload it as a seperate file![size=2]
[/size]4) Users/Modders are not allowed to use assets contained in my files in their own files![size=2]
[/size][b][i]5) Translations are allowed, no need to ask me. [/i][/b][size=2]
[/size][b][i][u]6) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my mods on Steam Workshop as their own to obtain money and it means the same for Permissions 2/3/4, my mods will always stay on nexus for free![/u][/i][/b][size=2]

[/size]Credits:[size=2]
[/size]Made by haldir307.
[/color]
author: haldir307
